Posted By: Martin Neal
Scans available upon request. Emails take precedence over posts. I will take care of shipping, but please add 3% if using Paypal. Thanks to everyone who purchased from me last week. Call me if you prefer at 434-825-6792. If mailing payment my address is 
Martin Neal
356 Squirrel Path
Charlottesville, Va 22901
